timeline.bodyText: We could make this into URL url = new URL("platform:/plugin/" + FRAGMENT_ID + resourcePath);
timeline.author: SaMuellerDLR
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -39,7 +37,6 @@ public static InputStream getResourceContentAsString(String resourcePath) throws
 		URL url;

timeline.bodyText: We use _ for separating single words in constant names. So NUMBEROFINTERFACES should be NUMBER_OF_INTERFACES.
timeline.author: SaMuellerDLR
